page.title: 17Farming
page.content: There are a lot of farms in the area surrounding Kilbarchan.Some of them{ being{Sandholes,Pannell,Waterstone,} {Locherside,Tweeniehills and {Wheatlands Farm.}These farms supply some local needs such as milk and potatoes. Some farms are devoted to raising cattle for dairy produce only,but others keep pigs,cows,sheep and also grow crops.the main crops around Kilbarchan being{barley,oats,potatoes {and turnips. In the area there are several small holdings which produce tomatoes and lettuce and a few other crops.They also grow plants and trees in their large greenhouses,which they sell direct to the public.{ {Kilbarchan Agricultural Society}hold an annual show at Monklands Farm.
